problem_names: theorem F1map_comp: "F1map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) = F1map f1 f2 o F1map g1 g2"
theorem F2map_comp: "F2map (f o g) = F2map f o F2map g"

theorem F1map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F1set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x"
theorem F2map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> F2map f x = F2map g x"
theorem F1set1_natural: "F1set1 o F1map f1 f2 = image f1 o F1set1"
theorem F1set2_natural: "F1set2 o F1map f1 f2 = image f2 o F1set2"
theorem F2set_natural: "F2set o F2map f = image f o F2set"
lemma F1in_alt: "F1in A2 A3 = Fin UNIV A2 A3"
lemma F2in_alt: "F2in A3 = Fin UNIV UNIV A3"
lemma Frel_cong: "\<lbrakk>R1 = S1; R2 = S2; R3 = S3\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Frel R1 R2 R3 = Frel S1 S2 S3"

lemmas F1rel_unfold = trans[OF F1rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F1in_alt]
      trans[OF arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ relcompp, OF trans[OF arg_cong[of _ _ conversep, OF sym[OF F.rel_Grp]] F.rel_conversep[symmetric]] sym[OF F.rel_Grp]]
        trans[OF F.rel_compp[symmetric] Frel_cong[OF trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] Grp_fst_snd Grp_fst_snd]]]]]

lemmas F2rel_unfold = trans[OF F2rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F2in_alt]
      trans[OF arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ relcompp, OF trans[OF arg_cong[of _ _ conversep, OF sym[OF F.rel_Grp]] F.rel_conversep[symmetric]] sym[OF F.rel_Grp]]
        trans[OF F.rel_compp[symmetric] Frel_cong[OF trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] Grp_fst_snd]]]]]
translations: theorem F1map_id: "F1map id id = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2map id = id
by (rule F.map_id0)
theorem F2map_id: "F2map id = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2map id = id
by (rule F.map_id0)
theorem F1map_comp: "F1map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) = F1map f1 f2 o F1map g1 g2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F1map (f1 \<circ> g1) (f2 \<circ> g2) = F1map f1 f2 \<circ> F1map g1 g2
by (unfold F.map_comp0[symmetric] o_id) (rule refl)
theorem F2map_comp: "F2map (f o g) = F2map f o F2map g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2map (f \<circ> g) = F2map f \<circ> F2map g
by (unfold F.map_comp0[symmetric] o_id) (rule refl)

theorem F1map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F1set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z;
     \<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x
apply (rule F.map_cong0)
apply (rule refl)
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>z3.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z;
        \<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z;
        z3 \<in> F2set x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f2 z3 = g2 z3
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
theorem F2map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> F2map f x = F2map g x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z) \<Longrightarrow>
    F2map f x = F2map g x
apply (rule F.map_cong0)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>z1.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z1 \<in> Fset1 x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id z1 = id z1
 2. \<And>z2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z2 \<in> F1set1 x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id z2 = id z2
 3. \<And>z3.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z3 \<in> F2set x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f z3 = g z3
apply (rule refl)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>z2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z2 \<in> F1set1 x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id z2 = id z2
 2. \<And>z3.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z3 \<in> F2set x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f z3 = g z3
apply (rule refl)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>z3.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f z = g z;
        z3 \<in> F2set x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f z3 = g z3
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
theorem F1set1_natural: "F1set1 o F1map f1 f2 = image f1 o F1set1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
by (rule F.set_map0(2))
theorem F1set2_natural: "F1set2 o F1map f1 f2 = image f2 o F1set2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
by (rule F.set_map0(3))
theorem F2set_natural: "F2set o F2map f = image f o F2set"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2set \<circ> F2map f = (`) f \<circ> F2set
by (rule F.set_map0(3))

abbreviation Fin :: "'a1 set \<Rightarrow> 'a2 set \<Rightarrow> 'a3 set \<Rightarrow> (('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F) set" where
  "Fin A1 A2 A3 \<equiv> {x. Fset1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> Fset2 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> Fset3 x \<subseteq> A3}"

abbreviation F1in :: "'a2 set \<Rightarrow> 'a3 set \<Rightarrow> (('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F) set" where
  "F1in A1 A2 \<equiv> {x. F1set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> F1set2 x \<subseteq> A2}"
lemma F1in_alt: "F1in A2 A3 = Fin UNIV A2 A3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. F1set1 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> F2set x \<subseteq> A3} =
    {x. Fset1 x \<subseteq> UNIV \<and>
        F1set1 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> F2set x \<subseteq> A3}
by (tactic \<open>BNF_Comp_Tactics.kill_in_alt_tac @{context}\<close>)

abbreviation F2in :: "'a3 set \<Rightarrow> (('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F) set" where
  "F2in A \<equiv> {x. F2set x \<subseteq> A}"
lemma F2in_alt: "F2in A3 = Fin UNIV UNIV A3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F2in A3 =
    {x. Fset1 x \<subseteq> UNIV \<and>
        F1set1 x \<subseteq> UNIV \<and> F2set x \<subseteq> A3}
by (tactic \<open>BNF_Comp_Tactics.kill_in_alt_tac @{context}\<close>)
lemma Frel_cong: "\<lbrakk>R1 = S1; R2 = S2; R3 = S3\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Frel R1 R2 R3 = Frel S1 S2 S3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>R1 = S1; R2 = S2; R3 = S3\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> Frel R1 R2 R3 = Frel S1 S2 S3
by hypsubst (rule refl)

definition F1rel where
  "F1rel R1 R2 = (BNF_Def.Grp (F1in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2))) (F1map fst fst))^--1 OO
                 (BNF_Def.Grp (F1in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2))) (F1map snd snd))"

lemmas F1rel_unfold = trans[OF F1rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F1in_alt]
      trans[OF arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ relcompp, OF trans[OF arg_cong[of _ _ conversep, OF sym[OF F.rel_Grp]] F.rel_conversep[symmetric]] sym[OF F.rel_Grp]]
        trans[OF F.rel_compp[symmetric] Frel_cong[OF trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] Grp_fst_snd Grp_fst_snd]]]]]

definition F2rel where
  "F2rel R1 = (BNF_Def.Grp (F2in (Collect (case_prod R1))) (F2map fst))^--1 OO
              (BNF_Def.Grp (F2in (Collect (case_prod R1))) (F2map snd))"

lemmas F2rel_unfold = trans[OF F2rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F2in_alt]
      trans[OF arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ relcompp, OF trans[OF arg_cong[of _ _ conversep, OF sym[OF F.rel_Grp]] F.rel_conversep[symmetric]] sym[OF F.rel_Grp]]
        trans[OF F.rel_compp[symmetric] Frel_cong[OF trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] trans[OF Grp_UNIV_id[OF refl] eq_alt[symmetric]] Grp_fst_snd]]]]]

bnf F1: "('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F"
  map: F1map
  sets: F1set1 F1set2
  bd: "bd_F :: ('p bd_type_F) rel"
  rel: F1rel

proof (prove)
goal (11 subgoals):
 1. F2map id = id
 2. \<And>f1 f2 g1 g2.
       F1map (g1 \<circ> f1) (g2 \<circ> f2) =
       F1map g1 g2 \<circ> F1map f1 f2
 3. \<And>x f1 f2 g1 g2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x
 4. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 5. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 6. card_order bd_F
 7. cinfinite bd_F
 8. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 9. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 10. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
        F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
A total of 11 subgoals...
apply -

proof (prove)
goal (11 subgoals):
 1. F2map id = id
 2. \<And>f1 f2 g1 g2.
       F1map (g1 \<circ> f1) (g2 \<circ> f2) =
       F1map g1 g2 \<circ> F1map f1 f2
 3. \<And>x f1 f2 g1 g2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x
 4. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 5. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 6. card_order bd_F
 7. cinfinite bd_F
 8. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 9. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 10. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
        F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
A total of 11 subgoals...
apply (rule F1map_id)

proof (prove)
goal (10 subgoals):
 1. \<And>f1 f2 g1 g2.
       F1map (g1 \<circ> f1) (g2 \<circ> f2) =
       F1map g1 g2 \<circ> F1map f1 f2
 2. \<And>x f1 f2 g1 g2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x
 3. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 4. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 5. card_order bd_F
 6. cinfinite bd_F
 7. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 8. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 9. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 10. \<And>R1 R2.
        F1rel R1 R2 =
        (\<lambda>x y.
            \<exists>z.
               (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
                F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
               F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F1map_comp)

proof (prove)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x f1 f2 g1 g2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> F1set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> F1map f1 f2 x = F1map g1 g2 x
 2. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 3. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 4. card_order bd_F
 5. cinfinite bd_F
 6. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 7. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 8. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 9. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (erule F1map_cong)

proof (prove)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x f1 f2 g1 g2 z1.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z2. z2 \<in> F2set x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2;
        z1 \<in> F2set x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f2 z1 = g2 z1
 2. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 3. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 4. card_order bd_F
 5. cinfinite bd_F
 6. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 7. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 8. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 9. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<And>f1 f2. F1set1 \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f1 \<circ> F1set1
 2. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 3. card_order bd_F
 4. cinfinite bd_F
 5. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 6. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 7. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 8. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F1set1_natural)

proof (prove)
goal (7 subgoals):
 1. \<And>f1 f2. F2set \<circ> F1map f1 f2 = (`) f2 \<circ> F2set
 2. card_order bd_F
 3. cinfinite bd_F
 4. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 5. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 6. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 7. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F1set2_natural)

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. card_order bd_F
 2. cinfinite bd_F
 3. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 4. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 5. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 6. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F.bd_card_order)

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. cinfinite bd_F
 2. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 3. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 4. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 5. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F.bd_cinfinite)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. |F1set1 x| \<le>o bd_F
 2. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 3. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 4. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F.set_bd(2))

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 2. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 3. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F.set_bd(3))

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       F1rel R1 R2 OO F1rel S1 S2 \<le> F1rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 2. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (unfold F1rel_unfold F.rel_compp[symmetric] eq_OO) [1]

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R1 R2 S1 S2.
       Frel (=) (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2) \<le> Frel (=) (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2)
 2. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule order_refl)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R1 R2.
       F1rel R1 R2 =
       (\<lambda>x y.
           \<exists>z.
              (F1set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
               F2set z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y}) \<and>
              F1map fst fst z = x \<and> F1map snd snd z = y)
apply (rule F1rel_def[unfolded OO_Grp_alt mem_Collect_eq])

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

bnf F2: "('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F"
  map: F2map
  sets: F2set
  bd: "bd_F :: ('p bd_type_F) rel"
  rel: F2rel

proof (prove)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. F2map id = id
 2. \<And>f g. F2map (g \<circ> f) = F2map g \<circ> F2map f

       F2map f x = F2map g x

 5. card_order bd_F
 6. cinfinite bd_F
 7. \<And>x. |F2set x| \<le>o bd_F
 8. \<And>R S. F2rel R OO F2rel S \<le> F2rel (R OO S)
 9. \<And>R.
       F2rel R =
       (\<lambda>x y.

              F2map fst z = x \<and> F2map snd z = y)
